paper_abstract: We are in an historical moment where computing is part of the social life. It does mean that computers are also part of crimes, both physical and virtual. In this an idea of the state of the art of the digital forensic will be provided, with special emphasis on UNIX operating systems and log file management. Included will also be an overview of current scientific research on the topic and illustrations of a number of potential issues that are often the subject of discussions in courtrooms the world over.
paper_title: The state of the art in digital forensics
